DOC.brief_summary: There evidence inpatient pulmonary rehabilitation 3 week improve exercise capacity quality life patient idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis . However , data available regard long-term effect multimodal program . The aim study investigate long-term impact rehabilitation program 3 month finishing exercise capacity physical activity .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Effects Inpatient Pulmonary Rehabilitation Program Patients With Pulmonary Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: want start rehabilitation program `` Schoen Klinik Berchtesgadener Land '' patient idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis ( vital capacity > 50 % pred . ) exacerbation last 4 week
